entry.title: Eocene Okanagan Highlands paleofauna (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that with more than 20 species, marchflies (example pictured) are the most common insect of the Eocene Okanagan Highlands paleofauna?

entry.title: Tibor Wlassics (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Tibor Wlassics's upper-class status forced him to work as a manual laborer?

entry.title: Bethune: The Making of a Hero (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Bethune: The Making of a Hero, once Canada's most expensive film, had a documentary about its troubled production shown at the 1988 Toronto International Film Festival instead of itself?

entry.title: Liang Tingnan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Chinese scholar Liang Tingnan suggested that China should emulate the United States to avoid the upheavals of dynastic change?

entry.title: Kingdom Two Crowns (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the music for the Norse Lands DLC of Kingdom Two Crowns utilizes the hurdy-gurdy and moraharpa?

entry.title: Mary Gardiner Horsford (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after Mary Gardiner Horsford died, her husband married her sister Phoebe?

entry.title: Amazonotrema (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that while most lichens that grow on plants live on the surface, the sole species in Amazonotrema grows partially among the cells of the tree bark on which it lives?

entry.title: Adib Pishavari (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Adib Pishavari likened Britain to an old fox?
